content: pleione is a loose summer tee with a low v-neck and lace details it has a simple top down raglan construction and the lace is beginner friendly made to suit any type of yarn colour or texture it s a crop knit to wear over dresses or high waisted pants it can easily be lenghtened and shaped to fit any personal style preference and will be a quick project to use up treasured skeins **sizes
